mapper.select: { call proc_r_signlist(#{u_empno}, #{key, jdbcType=CURSOR , mode=OUT , javaType=java.sql.ResultSet , resultMap=bmap})}
{ call proc_searchsign(#{u_input1}, #{u_input2}, #{u_empno}, ,#{key, jdbcType=CURSOR , mode=OUT , javaType=java.sql.ResultSet , resultMap=bmap})}
{ call proc_signform( #{key, jdbcType=CURSOR , mode=OUT , javaType=java.sql.ResultSet , resultMap=bmap})}
{ call proc_s_signlist(#{u_empno}, #{key, jdbcType=CURSOR , mode=OUT , javaType=java.sql.ResultSet , resultMap=bmap})}
